name: AI Shogi 2 Deluxe
overview: Ai Shogi 2 Deluxe is a shogi game that features different difficulty levels and a complete move explanation guide (with more than 100 movements) by the Japan Shogi Association chairman Satoshi Okada in which the player have to guess the right movement and Satoshi will tell it that is the right one or not. In the other mode the player can compete against the computer in shogi matches.
